# chwork

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of chwork is to provide an analytics library for Community Health Worker related data.

## Installation

You can install the released version of chwork from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("chwork")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("roboton/chwork")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(chwork)
## basic example code
```
